Package net.sf.dynamicreports.report.builder.column

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BooleanColumnBuilder
    It shows a boolean value either as a text or as an image.
    ColumnBuilder<T extends ColumnBuilder<T,U>,U extends DRColumn<?>>  
    ColumnBuilders
    A set of methods of creating report columns.
    Columns
    A set of methods of creating report columns.
    ComponentColumnBuilder
    It is used to display custom components (e.g. images or complex content) in columns.
    PercentageColumnBuilder
    It calculates percentage values from the field or column values.
    TextColumnBuilder<T>
    It is used to show values from the data source.
    ValueColumnBuilder<T extends ValueColumnBuilder<T,U>,U>
